LightningComponentBundle.description: This component helps in monitoring all the 'In Progress/Not Started' jobs. If none, displays the latest job for the record.

property.name: jobExecutionField
property.description: This property supports using the relationship field of this object with Job Execution.
property.label: Job Execution Field

property.name: jobTemplateApiName
property.description: Specify the API name of the job template to optionally filter the job execution. This feature proves particularly useful when you intend to differentiate between two distinct job executions in two separate component.
property.label: Job Template API Name

property.name: noJobTitle
property.label: No Job Title
property.description: Provide the title for illustration which will be displayed when there is no job created for the record.

property.name: noJobMessage
property.label: No Job Message
property.description: Provide the message for illustration which will be displayed when there is no job created for the record.
